channel.title: [need help]317 pkp shop

item.title: [need help]317 pkp shop
item.dc:creator: @Stijn12 Stijn12
item.description:
@Stijn12 wrote:

Well i need a pkp shop,
But everytime i buy an item in it it says:
Not enough pkpoints.
Even though i bought the items for coins i still get the item, and even thought i dont have pkpoints
Please tell me what’s the problem
HERE’s the codes:

[code]if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 1) {
sM(“You don’t have enough PK points.”);
break;

}[/code]

if (MyShopID == 1) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }

sM(getItemName(removeID) + ": currently costs " + ShopValue + " Pk-Points " + ShopAdd); }

Read full topic
